sections.title: Daivrat (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Daivrat class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Daivrat)
sections.description: A daivrat gains no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: Spells (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat gains spells per day and increased caster level as if advancing in a previous spellcasting class, but gains no other class benefits.

sections.title: Elemental Focus (Su) (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat chooses an elemental descriptor and is treated as having Spell Focus for spells with that descriptor.

sections.title: Genie-Tongue (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat gains bonuses on Charisma-based checks to influence genies and Knowledge checks about genies.

sections.title: Spell-Fetch (Su) (Daivrat)
sections.description: Once per day, the daivrat can conjure a minor genie to temporarily grant access to a spell not normally known, but at increased spell level cost.

sections.title: Genie’s Friend (Su) (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat gains a bonus to caster level when conjuring genies.

sections.title: Elemental Attunement (Ex) (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat gains energy resistance 5 against acid, cold, electricity, or fire.

sections.title: Zhyen Familiar (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat can select a zhyen as a familiar, replacing any existing familiar as if having the Improved Familiar feat.

sections.title: Greater Elemental Focus (Su) (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat's elemental focus ability upgrades to Greater Spell Focus for spells with the chosen descriptor.

sections.title: Genie-kin (Ex) (Daivrat)
sections.description: The daivrat's type changes to outsider (native) and gains multiple energy resistances and damage reduction.
